Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each particle quality level.

softParticleEnabled.Wiki: If ON, soft particles are enabled.

distortionEnable.Wiki: If ON, particles may distort the screenspace.

cs_upScaleEnabledType.Wiki: Determines the bilateral upscaling settings for particles.

fNumOnceEmitsScale.AltName: Number of Emits in Particle Instance
fNumOnceEmitsScale.Wiki: Determines the maximum number of emits within one instance of a particle.

fLodDistance1Scale.Wiki: The first LOD distance scale for particles.

fLodDistance2Scale.Wiki: The second LOD distance scale for particles.

fLodDistance3Scale.Wiki: The third LOD distance scale for particles.

fLodDistance4Scale.Wiki: The fourth LOD distance scale for particles.

fScaleRenderDistanceScale.Wiki: The magnification to the distance registered in the reduction buffer for particles.
